title: Smartphone-Based Online Course for Developing Elementary School Students' Critical Thinking in Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized content accessible via smartphones, structured as 5-10 minute modular learning units

learning_goals: Learners can transform everyday problems into mathematical models.
Learners analyze data patterns and draw conclusions using digital tools.
Learners structure their thinking processes through a peer feedback system.
Learners creatively apply problem-solving strategies even in environments with limited technological resources.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
